name: New Year's Champagne Cocktail: The Chic French 75
description: his French 75 uses sugar cubes to add a touch of exhibitionism to a New Year's cocktail party. Pass a tray of these lemon and gin and Champagne cocktails around, and as each guest picks one up, drop a sugar cube or two into their flute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cold gin and lemon juice in a champagne flute. Top with cold champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.
As you serve the cocktail, drop a sugar cube to the bottom of the glass, and watch the cocktail come to life as it fizzes and pops.
